long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Self Custody, Open-Source Litecoin Wallet
Explore the Omnilite & Ordinal Space in the world first Wallet which combines both Token types.

Features
- send and receive native Litecoin
- send and receive Omnilite Token and NFT
- send and recieve Inscriptions
- trade Omnilite Token on the dedicated Exchange which is hosted by all Omnilite Nodes together
- create partly signed Multisignature Transactions

- *soon* use the build in API to connect to your Websites


LiteWorlds Wallet is a Multisignature Wallet, your Wallet Informations are derived out of combination of your Seed and Password.
Your private keys are only stored on your device and never get shared with anyone.
LiteWorlds Wallet does not track any account addresses, or asset balances. This data are requested from LitecoinSpace.org or LiteWorlds.quest.


GitHub
